actions.text: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Tipton.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 116-395 to require the Department of Defense to conduct a study on the impacts that the expansion of wilderness designations in the Western United States would have on the readiness of our armed forces with respect to aviation training.
purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 116-395 to require the Department of Defense to conduct a study on the impacts that the expansion of wilderness designations in the Western United States would have on the readiness of our armed forces with respect to aviation training.
